1.name: Scribe's First Lesson
1.description: Learn the most basic hieroglyphs used in ancient Egyptian writing.

2.name: Temple Inscriptions
2.description: Decipher sacred symbols found carved on temple walls.

3.name: Royal Cartouche
3.description: Unlock the mysteries of pharaonic names and titles.

4.name: Divine Pantheon
4.description: Channel the power of the major gods in your calculations.

5.name: Sacred Assembly
5.description: Invoke the wisdom of the lesser-known but powerful deities.

6.name: Court of the Pharaoh
6.description: Master the symbols representing the most prestigious roles in Egypt.

7.name: Artisan's Guild
7.description: Understand the crafts and trades that built ancient Egypt.

8.name: Sacred Menagerie
8.description: Harness the spiritual power of Egypt's most revered animals.

9.name: Nile Creatures
9.description: Connect with the life-giving spirits of the great river.

10.name: Celestial Council
10.description: Complete your understanding of the divine hierarchy.

11.name: Desert Guardians
11.description: Master the symbols of the fierce protectors of the sands.

12.name: Tomb Treasures
12.description: Unlock the power of the most sacred artifacts of the pharaohs.

13.name: Temple Servants
13.description: Honor those who served the gods and maintained divine order.

14.name: Divine Regalia
14.description: Wield the symbols of ultimate power and divine authority.

15.name: Supreme Mysteries
15.description: Combine the most powerful symbols from all realms of Egyptian knowledge.

16.name: Pharaoh's Legacy
16.description: Master the ultimate artifacts that represent eternal divine rule.

17.name: Osiris' Judgment
17.description: Face the ultimate test with symbols of death, rebirth, and divine judgment.

18.name: Architect of Eternity
18.description: Design your path to immortality using the most sacred combinations.

19.name: Solar Majesty
19.description: Channel the combined power of sun, war, and divine creation.

20.name: Ra's Eternal Throne
20.description: Achieve the highest level of Egyptian mystical knowledge and divine authority.
